google.title: Busuu: Learn & Speak Languages
google.description: Learn Spanish with language learning designed to build confidence from day one. Connect with our online language learning Community and get feedback on exercises and Spanish vocabulary from fluent speakers. Easily see what needs more revision, from Spanish verbs to pronunciation, and learn how to speak Spanish plus other languages faster! Learn how to speak Spanish üá™üá∏, Japanese üáØüáµ, English üá¨üáß, French üá´üá∑, Italian üáÆüáπ, Portuguese üáßüá∑, German üá©üá™, Korean üá∞üá∑, Polish üáµüá±, Russian üá∑üá∫, Turkish üáπüá∑, Arabic, Chinese üá®üá≥ & Dutch üá≥üá±. ‚òÖ Google Play ‚Äì Editor‚Äôs Choice ‚òÖ LANGUAGE LEARNING, POWERED BY PEOPLE Learn Spanish Learn how to speak Spanish with confidence from your first lesson. Whether at beginner or intermediate level, learn to hold a real-life conversation in Spanish with support from our language learning Community. Improve your Spanish verbs and learn Spanish grammar with language learning opportunities to practice writing, reading, listening, and speaking. Learn Japanese Enjoy interactive Japanese lessons that help you progress from beginner to intermediate. Learn from fluent speakers and get useful tips from our international language learning Community. Learn to read and write in Japanese with unique hiragana, katakana, and kanji lessons. Our complete Japanese course covers all the reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills you need for language learning. Choose from 14 languages From beginner to intermediate lessons, Busuu offers free language learning courses designed by experts in 14 different languages. Learn how to speak Spanish, Japanese, French, Arabic, Chinese, Dutch, English, German, Italian, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, and Turkish. JOIN OUR GLOBAL COMMUNITY OF OVER 120 MILLION REGISTERED USERS ‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ Learn from fluent speakers/b> Learn how to speak Spanish and other languages like a local by discovering how the language you‚Äôre learning is used in real-life scenarios. Get feedback and exchange tips with our international language learning community to help you learn Spanish quickly. Learn Spanish and get prepared for real-life conversations from your first lesson. Up-to-date course content Our courses are regularly updated and combine video bites featuring real people with audio learning to help learn Spanish, Japanese, English, and other languages more easily. Discover our latest range of dedicated specialty courses, including: Spanish - Advanced Spanish Exam Preparation Japanese - Manga English - English for Business & English Exam Success Confident in real-life conversations Join our international language learning Community to learn Spanish and prepare for real-world conversations. See and hear real fluent speakers to boost your conversational skills. Receive reminders tailored to help you learn Spanish and reach your language learning goals faster. Learn how to speak Spanish through a variety of interactive lessons, specialty courses, and bespoke content that prepares you for real-world conversations. Learn Spanish verbs, vocabulary, and grammar with dedicated language learning spaces for confident communication. Whether it's business, travel, school, or personal enjoyment, the end goal is learning how to speak Spanish and hold real-world conversations. Busuu, a Chegg Service. DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE LANGUAGE LEARNING Subscription is required for full access. Read our terms and conditions: https://www.busuu.com/en/terms Privacy policy: https://www.busuu.com/en/privacy Need some help? We‚Äôre here to support you in English, French, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese & Indonesian.

To bad the French used in the app is Canadian french and not regular French as they speak in France. As my French friends pointed out this Canadian French is not useful in France. Therefore this app is not suited to learn proper French.
ik zit nog te leren Ma het is wel leuk Ma je kan het snel vergeten wat je leert ik weet nog niet veel over de app
App works fine, but I'm disappointed. Paid for premium just to find out that it only offers levels A1 - B2 Russian.
ik krijg de interfacetaal niet in het nederlands. hier heb ik niks aan

De moeilijkheidsgraad van de lessen klopt niet. Er worden dingen van je gevraagd die je op dat niveau nog niet kan. Als het je dan niet lukt, kan je niet verder, omdat de cursus blijft vragen die onmogelijke opgave eerst zonder fouten te doen.
begin is goed
de best appe
i can't login with my google account anymore?

I'm missing the option to use my native Dutch language. Also, it would have been nice if there was Dutch as an option to learn for foreign people. The grammatica learning in this app is the best I have seen so far.
top
very good
I know six languages and, in my opinion, Busuu is the best language learning app available in the Play Store. Thank you for the great value you offer!
goei app alleen moet je betalen voor een betere versie
brilliant app! Expensive, but honestly worth it compared to others. I'd love to be able to have a widget of this app tho! Will refresh my subscription once it ends.

Bij het eerste lesje Spaans - Engels kwam ik al een foute vertaling tegen. Waarschijnlijk wordt Google Translate gebruikt voor de vertalingen. Er is geen optie om het probleem te melden. Hierdoor heb ik geen vertrouwen in deze spaanstalige lessen.
It is perfect!! Not only just grammar and voc but culture too!!!!!!
Very good app to learn languages! üëå
Nieuw geinstalleerd. Probeer account aan te maken. Zegt dat ik die al heb. Reset link wordt niet gestuurd. Kan met geen mogelijkheid inloggen vanwege deze loop. Slecht begin.
its good and easy to learn the basic and more
yay

Esperienza positiva! Si impara il lessico, alcuni modi di dire, gli esercizi vertono su situazioni reali. Inoltre la grande "forza" di questa app sono gli esercizi di scrittura che vengono corretti direttamente dai madrelingua. Fantastico. Alla mia valutazione manca una stella per un paio di inezie. La grammatica √® pochina, e i corsi si fermano al b2, mi sarebbe piaciuto almeno provare il c1. per il resto √® l'app migliore per imparare da zero o allenarsi con le lingue che gi√† si conoscono.
Top, leuk om te leren bij busuu
top
heel fijn
na het installeren komt de app niet door het inloggen, beide opties google en Facebook geprobeerd, maar geen gebruikt kunnen maken van taalcursus

The language learning itself is really good but I wish I could add my real-life friends to see what they're up to, and not random people on the app that I don't know or need anything from. Also, I wish the app actually sent lesson reminders - I've checked all my notification settings but it looks like such notifications just don't exist, making me forget to do my lesson a lot of the time.
je leert veel meer dan bij duolingo en de kwaliteit is ook veel beter, als je echt op zoek bent naar het leren van een taal om te gebruiken in het dagelijks leven moet je dit proberen!

Op dit moment ben ik erg tevreden over de App; in tegenstelling tot D-lingo kan ik hier wel gewoon een behoorlijk taalniveau (Frans) nastreven. Natuurlijk moet ik het zelf doen. Vraag; bestaat er ook zoiets als een "familie-account". Tegen een gunstig bedrag met vijf mensen een taal naar keuze leren? Zou leuk zijn.
goede uitleg grammatica maar te weinig oefeningen

i can't log into my account, it takes forever to load. making a new account w a different email address also takes a full calendar year. i'd love to practice languages with this app but for some reason it just wont let me log in.
heel mooie app
in spanish, the speak to quick when learning in an early stage
Formidabel !
goede app
Spreekoefeningen werken niet tijdens de lessen, moet ze telkens overslaan omdat het niet goed gaat. Gelukkig zijn er nog mensen die de optionele oefeningen controleren ...
gebruiksvriendelijk en goede praktische oefeningen
geweldige app om talen mee te leren, velen malen beter dan duolingo. Hier kan je namelijk feedback vragen/krijgen van mensen waar de taal die je studeert hun moedertaal van is.
satisfied with the system, just a bummer there are lots of ads
Nog steeds een prima app om talen te leren, maar hij loopt bij mij standaard vast bij de externe reclame aan het begin, bv. voor een game. Bij reclame voor Busuu zelf, gebeurt dit niet.
good good good

the language learning aspect here is pretty good. but the way the app is constantly begging you to correct other people's exercises is extremely annoying and there is no way to turn that off. I don't want to. I shouldn't. I suck at that stuff. let me opt out.
heel mooi en eenvoudig aap.

Er staan maar een paar talen in. Zweeds is er niet bij... dus voor mij geen goede app Ik wil zweeds leren... dus als je me beantwoordt in het zweeds begrijp ik er niet veel van... üòÇüòÇüòÇ behalve tack dan!
hella good
op jouw gemak leren
Busy geef mij goed vrustan
very good one
Ik geniet nu van het leren

Voor het begin 5 sterren! Veel beter dan Duolingo! Betere uitleg en niet die irritante poppetjes en stemmetjes zoals bij Duolingo. Ook hier veel reclame, maar de indruk dat je hiervan meer leert; dus neem ik de reclame op de koop toe. Benieuwd of ik zo positief blijf.
After almost a year of using this app and others (free and not), this is the one with the best content. The software side could be improved but at the end of the day still good quality content.

I've just paid for this app. I think it's amazing, the devices to add, the price is high, but within reasonable bounds (i got it 70% off). One thing i hate is the AI. Suddenly every app got AI and i think it doesn't help very well with this one. Regardless, great app overall.
Nice app but too many ads. And it is even stuck on loading sometimes so you have lood ads TWICE!

Exam question "write Arabic" and then prevent the user from answering that question???? In a language app that charges you for it and does not respond to submitting this big?? Same disease as Duolingo: worthless!!!!
Love it

Using this to learn Turkish. It feels like the excersises are made by AI. It would be good to have a human go over the excersises to correct them. Especially since language is a human thing, not a computer thing. Reviewing words is the best way to actually memorize the vocabulary. But it keeps giving you the same words and never gives you new words you learned to review. This could be improved so much. Okay app, but feels very detached from human usge. Please hire some actual people!
it a good but very expensive
I wanted to learn arab but i didnt get the rights arabic
busuuuuiiiiiiii
Het is goed dat er telkens veel herhaald wordt. Zo blijven de uitdrukkingen en woorden beter hangen.
Een uitstekend en leerzame app alleen vind wel jammer dat de oefeningen worden niet nagekeken!
I have to make an account just to see if this app might be a good choice for me? Uhm, nope!
Goed om mee te beginnen...

goed

it loads pretty slowly to go from one excercise to the other. also kinda stupid that if you do the test between lesson and you pass the test. you still need to do the lesson so that the percentage of your level goes up.
Heel goede app, legt ook alles goed uit. Duolingo daarentegen verbetert je enkel en alleen, maar geeft geen uitleg erbij. Heel blij met de app!

The number of courses is vast. However, they lack many important aspects like translation of sentences in higher levels of language (dutch and italian in my case) after cholsing an answer i get a comment in that language which is stupid as I'm not proficient enough to understand it.some texts which are prepared for the exercises should be translated so that when you are not sure what's this on about, you can check it. Interface is slow and changing course to another language is thus problematic
heel goed
ik vind het een geweldige app wasr ik goed van heb geleerd!!

It makes learning fun and it's improving my language skills.
zeer tevreden en goed opgebouwd
Overall, I have a positive experience using Busuu. However, the mobile app and the web version don't sync with each other.
Great for (higher) intermediate level learners. It's full of features and helpful, friendly people. It's certainly better than the green owl.

very entertaining to learn Japanese with clear voices and beautiful pictures!
beter dan Duolingo, omdat je uitleg krijgt waar de les over gaat en je ziet echte mensen spreken in korte videos

perfect

In the dutch course, asking what the plural of the name 'school' is, and the options include such as 'schools'. If this were a qualifying exam, I could say Ok. but it is not. I think that this multiple choice question method, which makes someone who is just starting to learn a language think about the possibility of being correct by showing wrong options, is not useful. This incident reminded me of the movie 12 Monkeys, Cole was sent to the past to prevent the disaster, but he himself caused it
The best language learning application I found so far. Tips mentioning differences in dialects of the chosen language are a huge advantage.
best goed gemaakt
Good way to learn a new language. Useful words and sentences. A shame they don't have a Swedish course
nice

Busuu is the best language learning app out there (in my opinion).
prima!
very nice learning app way better than duolingo

Great app for learning languages. I especially love the peer review system. It's possible to write or speak phrases and have native speakers review it. That really helps with pronunciation.
Much better than Duolingo! This is harder but I'm learning more

Op mijn zoekopdracht voor een taal-app Bulgaars in de playstore ten onrechte aanbevolen: er is geen optie om deze taal te leren. Eigenlijk is 1 ster in mijn geval dus al te veel en Playstore verdient hiermee in feite ook een slechtere kwalificatie, immers: het roept maar wat.

Very annoying, very slow app. Everything loads slow so less motivated to do a lesson. The leaderboard is hidden with a tiny button for some reason. And they also always show an add about their premium plan which is 15 seconds long. It's pretty decent for learning but you can only do one language at a time and they should make lessons more motiviting by maybe adding a stop in a lesson that says: keep on going or something. Duolingo is much better.
very good user friendly. And if you get a subscription at a reduced rate, the cost of extending it again, remains the same price.
A nice app to learn a language while also being part of an online community to receive help and help others.
Heel fijne app! Ik vind het prettiger dan DuoLingo. De uitleg is beter en duidelijk. Leuk dat je vrienden kan maken die hun moedertaal spreken en elkaar kan corrigeren.

When studying in japanese alphabet characters, your answers might be right, but the app tells you yoy are wrong. Set is to English alphabet and you put in same answers you are now correct. Kinda hard to learn the right alphabet and characters... shame. Hope it will be fixed soon cause the app itself is a good extra learning app on top off the others I use to learn japanese

Horrible app. They won't let you use the free version without bothering you with popups about their paid version. 10 popups per minute is ridiculous. Uninstalled it.

The time estimatation when setting a goal is not accurate and is far far far away from a realistic one. One better not to set goal otherwise get disappointed not too long after start working with this app. Spoken practices stop working on my android phone. I've tried everything (un install, reinstall, clearing cache,..) and even report the bug several weeks ago but the ultimate response was to try web version but not app for spoken drills! Overall I am not happy with this app :(

5 sterren voor de informatie en de 'live' mogelijkheden om in de community feedback te krijgen op schrijven en uitspraak. 2 sterren omdat je maar enkele lessen kunt doen zonder betaalde account en het feit dat je wel Nederlands kunt leren met deze app maar als je Nederlands talig bent en je wilt bijvoorbeeld Frans leren dan verloopt dit in het Engels....logica????? Daarom het gemiddelde van 3 sterren.

Nice to learn on the go. Also good to use on pc. Helps you to learn a language on your own pace

Lessons are divided into short pieces so it is easy to take them in between work or during breaks. The social aspect and leaderboards can be good motivation to not stall or even fall behind your goals.
Praktisch! Vooral met de herhalingen.

Watch out for this app! They will try to trick you with an automatic subscription renewal after 2 years at twice the original price (‚Ç¨150 in my case) without warning. The internet is full of people with similar experiences. I got my refund in the end, but maybe that's only because I wrote a lengthy email explaining why what they're doing is technically illegal... Just Google "When is auto-renewal of consumer contracts likely to be unfair?" and you will find the arguments you need!
Deutliche Anweisungen, macht so viel Spass!
Super application pour apprendre, cee qui serait bien c'est de pouvoir communiquer avec nos amis un peu comme un r√©seau social et l√† ce serait parfait.
Tot nu toe vind ik Busuu erg leuk, je moet w√©l heel goed opletten en kunnen onthouden.

The best app for language self-learners I've discovered so far. I'm only in the beginning, but I'm really enjoying it. It consists of lessons that are progressively structured and bring you from the absolute zero to level B2. The lessons are short, interactive and cover all the important topics you need to learn while acquiring the language. The best thing about the app for me is that it forces you to use the language. You have to speak and write and then be reviewed by the community!
Fantastyczna aplikacja, ≈Çatwa w obs≈Çudze, kr√≥tkie lekcje, fajny interface

Using it for Japanese. Great way to learn a new language! It explains grammar really well and you can interact with native speakers to correct your/their exercises. The Premium Plus subscription is also totally worth it.

I love Busuu because it gives more explanation than for instance Duo. Also it is more Spain oriented and teaches past tense as well as the vosotros forms as well. I find Babbel confusing because they use long sentences I don't understand yet in their examples. People nagging about it is useless when free: this is a paid form of learning. And they do it very well. Want free? Use a different program. Oh, at last, what I really like: you can get in touch with native speakers who can correct you
Great app!
Ik krijg elke dag spam of ik niet de app wil kopen. Deze notificaties zijn niet uit te zetten!! Ik was erg blij met de app maar heb hem om deze reden net verwijderd. Dit is niet ok√©.
Snel gesproken.

Alles is bijna betalen. Subscription is ook relatief duur. In de gratis versie kan je naar woorden luisteren en woorden verlaten ( waarbij de vertaling soms in dezelfde taal staat, dus gewoon hetzelfde woord met hetzelfde woord matchen)

Fijne, goed verzorgde app. Ook heel geschikt voor gevorderden. Met aandacht voor alle facetten van de taal. Uitspraak, grammatica, luistervaardigheden, schrijven en natuurlijk uitbreiding van de woordenschat. Belangrijk pluspunt daarbij: je leert niet alleen de nieuwe woorden, maar ook hoe je die in een zin kunt gebruiken. Slechts 1 minpuntje: de gesprekken in de les - waarin uiteraard meer woorden zitten dan die je geleerd hebt - worden niet vertaald. De overige zinnen wel.

Great language learning üëçüëçüëç The is built so that you are learning the basics from the beginning like the alphabet and lets you learn more and more while you progres and this is not like other language learning apps where you learn useless words and sentences it lets you learn usefull words, sentences, and more for in real life conversations. Great app to learn a language. Especially the contact with native speakers is unique and motivating! Only giving it 4 stars for now since my native language (Dutch) is not (yet) supported.
